name: Wool Blend Warmer, Shawl, Cover Up in Shades of Heather
description:
NEW:::On the Town Wool Blend Warmer in Shades of Heather:::

A romantic creation.

Highly versatile because of the different ways to wear it...super soft and super comfy...perfect for any day! 

Very feminine and pretty. Light and airy but also adds warmth to your outfits. 

This wool/acrylic blend warmer in heather shades would be a great accessory to your wardrobe; less bulky than scarves, wear all day, small enough to throw in your bag...Wear how you wish0.

Wear as a shawl, wear as a cowl, pull up over your head running in and out of stores for errands, lace a ribbon through it to give it even more looks. Wear soft and draped or bunched up around your neck as a cowl for warmth and color. Color variety is beautiful.

Hand wash in cold water, “roll” gently in towel to remove excess water and lay flat to dry.

name: pumpkin orange crochet flower clip
description:
This oversized, orange crochet flower clip with lemongrass leaves looks great clipped to my fiber necklaces, cowl, scarflettes, or even in your hair. 

Large size crochet flower is affixed with barrette backing to avoid snagging when clipped to crochet pieces and/or multi use when wearing in your hair. The crochet flower is pinned to the dress form for display purposes only. If would like to have a pin sewn to the back to be worn as a brooch in place of barrette backing, you must include in your buyer notes. No additional fee.

Will ship within within 1-3 full business days. COLORS VARY FROM SCREEN TO SCREEN. All LED pieces are one of a kind. STOCK PHOTO SHOWN. Comes wrapped for gift giving.

Perfect for bridesmaids, favors, and gifts.

name: Mini Crochet Flower Hair Band in Pumpkin Orange
description:
This listing is for the hair band worn by Nella. A one size fits all- mini crochet flower is attached to a stretchy black and white hair band. Looks adorable on baby, toddler, teen or adult.

The crochet flower with pearl bead can also be attached to the following colors:
-black
-white
-red
-navy blue

Please include the alternate color other than the standard black and white striped band for this listing in your buyer notes at checkout. Please Note: Stock photo is used. Every piece is one of a kind and not intended to be the same as any other.

Ships within 1-3 FULL business for shipment. 
All content © 2009-2011 LilianEveDesigns made by led 
Photo Credit: Kelle Hampton

name: Collar Scarflette in Oatmeal
description:
Live a little old world. A romantic little piece designed to be versatile because of the different ways to wear it...super soft and super comfy... wear with a tank, little dress, tucked into your jacket, dress up everyday outfits. Add your own ribbons and brooches.

This wool blend collar- scarflette in oatmeal is a great accessory to your wardrobe; less bulky than scarves, wear all day, small enough to throw in your bag...Wear how you wish. Wear as a scarflette, wear as a mini cowl, pull up over your head running in and out of stores for errands & keep warm, lace a ribbon through it to give it even more looks. Shown here is a black & white knit piece laced through. Included and removeable.

Hand wash in cold water, “roll” gently in towel to remove excess water and lay flat to dry.

name: Barley Hooded Scarf
description:
Warm and super cozy. 

Wear as a hooded scarf or as a warmer. Surely a piece you won't leave home without during the cold, winter months. This winter barley color has beautiful speckles throughout and compliments any outfit. Thick, chunky, and multiple ways to wrap yourself up.

Scarf has a hood built in but see pics that can also be worn other ways. Hood is a cover for the head to block out wind chill and cold. Large toggle button used to enclose yourself as you wish:). Enjoy!

Please see shop policies for additional information. Thank-you!

Launder Care:
Machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle and lay flat to dry.
